author: ealexjordan
body: Resolves #974 - Invoke-Item doesn't do anything. Also added a test to at least verify invoke-item can exit successfully.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Waiting on process fix for AppVeyor to pass.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Set the Pester tests to be $Pending:IsWindows. Testing on windows uncovered invoke-item was broken on all platforms, including windows. Linux and OSX are fixed.

title: Invoke-Item
